title: Leaving match
body:
I start paying like an noob as usual and i need to go to bathroom u know why and simply get taht queue and it gives me 30 mins befor i start the match i playd like an normal guy beacose i knew it was a problem and i playd 10 times and then 30 times AND DIDNT DESAPEAR PLS HELP ME!!!???

 And pleas destroy that queue!!!??? 

THX.

replies.body:
i uunderstan rip
but something worse happened to me #my newest boards post

League of legends is all about preparation in and outside of the rift.  I understand being torn between the call to arms and the call of nature, and [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) wouldn't affect you after only one game.  It would require multiple leaves for the lower priority queue to escalate.  The system also treats everyone equally because all leaves causes negative experiences for others.    

If all else fails, grab your PC and claim the porcelain throne as the one true king of the rift.  Unless you're on a desktop, in which case gg.
